name: CodePush
description: A VSO build task for releasing app updates to the CodePush service
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: accessKey
inputs.label: Access Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access key used to authenticate with the CodePush service

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the app you want to release an update for

inputs.name: packagePath
inputs.label: Package Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file or directory that contains the content you want to release

inputs.name: appStoreVersion
inputs.label: App Store Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The app store version that this release depends on (must be semver compliant)

inputs.name: deploymentName
inputs.label: Deployment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the deployment under the app which you want to push the release to

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Package Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of the package to be released

inputs.name: isMandatory
inputs.label: Mandatory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the release should be considered mandatory
